name: Strange Sex
overview: Strange Sex is an American documentary series that aired on TLC from July 18, 2010 to August 5, 2012. The series explores all things sex and relationships, especially if they are atypical.

episodes.name: Cougars and Cubs
episodes.overview: Hattie is a 73-year old former model and dancer; Ron is a 33-year old father of two. Despite being born decades apart, the two have decided to go on a date.

episodes.name: Unusual Orgasms
episodes.overview: A woman claims to be capable of orgasming by simply thinking.

episodes.name: Two Boyfriends and a Baby
episodes.overview: Jaiya, John, and Ian have lived polyamorously for two years.

episodes.name: Uncontrollable Urges
episodes.overview: Rock star Phil has been a sex addict for fifteen years.

episodes.name: Balloon Fetish
episodes.overview: Balloons terrified Chris. But what was once his worst nightmare became his greatest pleasure. For Scott, having an orgasm brings him no pleasure. He suffered in silence, but now, there might be hope for him.

episodes.name: Pleasure and Pain
episodes.overview: As Chris was having sex, a flood of fluid gushed from her vagina. Chris was mortified. Then, she learned what it was and later, Gene and James are the perfect couple. But when they have sex, all Gene feels is pain.

episodes.name: The Tugger & Double Trouble
episodes.overview: A man is looking to rev up his sex life; a woman must cope with the possibility she may never have children.

episodes.name: Secret Pain
episodes.overview: A newly wed couple discovers Vaginismus when trying to consummate their marriage.

episodes.name: Size Matters & Gender Bender
episodes.overview: A man finds out that bigger is not always better; a woman learns that defining one's gender is not so clear-cut.

episodes.name: Bedroom Coach & Hidden Manhood
episodes.overview: A couple struggles with intimacy while a man with a bizarre ailment must come to terms.

episodes.name: The More the Merrier & Surrogate Manhood
episodes.overview: A husband and wife living out in the country keep their marriage spicy by swinging. Later, a man who suffers a tragic accident must rediscover and reinvent his sexuality as a Quadripelegic.

episodes.name: Born Without and A Broken Man
episodes.overview: A woman born without a vagina must decide whether or not to tell the man of her dreams about her strange condition, and risk losing him forever. Then, a man suffers a bizarre penile deformation and must undergo an extreme treatment.

episodes.name: Right Guy, Wrong Body
episodes.overview: Even as small child, Nat was tormented by the feeling that he had been born in the wrong body.

episodes.name: Manhandled & The Real 40-year-old Virgin?
episodes.overview: A female wrestler capitalizes on a growing subculture that involves men who are sexually aroused by climbing into the ring and getting thrown around by muscular women.

episodes.name: A Piercing Pleasure & Losing My Manhood
episodes.overview: Sex is never boring for James and Andi, they have supercharged their sex life with genital piercings.

episodes.name: Weight For It & Desperate Measures
episodes.overview: Food is the ultimate aphrodisiac for a couple; a man becomes ill after the act of sex.

episodes.name: The Year's Best
episodes.overview: The Year's Best brings together ten of the top Strange Sex stories from across the action packed series, revealing the strangest and most unusual stories of real life relationships and fascinating sexual practices.

episodes.name: Adult Breastfeeding; Revirginization
episodes.overview: In the Season 3 premiere, a woman's breast milk helps her husband get in the mood, while a couple celebrate their 40th wedding anniversary with a hymenoplasty.

episodes.name: Record Breaking Breasts; The Coital Curse
episodes.overview: A woman who has headaches after climaxing; a woman with large natural breasts.

episodes.name: 160lb Scrotum; Dominatrix in Training
episodes.overview: A man with a swollen scrotum; a woman's training for a new career in domination and submission.

episodes.name: Erotic Aroma; From Pleasure to Pain
episodes.overview: A woman suffers from pain in a sensitive area; a man has a fetish for the aroma of a woman's foot.

episodes.name: Super Orgasmic Man; Big Love
episodes.overview: A man's multiple orgasms in 15 minutes; a man's fantasy of a giant woman on a rampage through a miniature city.

episodes.name: Sexaholic; Broken Genitals
episodes.overview: A suburban mother's sex addiction; a man born with two holes in his penis.

episodes.name: The Inseminator
episodes.overview: Trent's mission is to help childless couples get pregnant; he is a virgin with 15 kids.

episodes.name: Ms. Orgasm; Excruciating Ecstasy
episodes.overview: A man is in pain during sex ever since he had a vasectomy more than a year ago; a woman claims she can reach orgasm without physical contact.

episodes.name: Erection Correction; Sex Furniture
episodes.overview: A male can't get an erection after the age of 12; a couple put their house on the market when it's filled with sex furniture.

episodes.name: Sleep Orgasms & Male Breasts
episodes.overview: A man born with a condition that causes enlarged breasts; a woman who reaches orgasm while sleeping.
